relevance_explanation: The routine was correctly trimmed. The `get_account_type_extra` call was replaced with the account type directly, as the information was available in the customer data. The client level being STANDARD was also correctly used to keep the address hold step.
completeness_explanation: All necessary steps for this customer were preserved, including the address hold application due to the STANDARD client level. The customer ID was also correctly injected into the `update_address`, `apply_address_hold`, and `complete_case` tool calls.
